name: Crystal Conquer
description: Crystal Conquer is an RPG game set in modern day England. The Player Controls Julianna Manfield, the head of the Earth and Materials Sciences Department in the University of Sciences in London. The story revolves around the desire of Professor Manfield to conquer England and control its people. Her plan is figured out by the English Curling Association, when after returning to Kent from a tournament in Canada they find their region all under the Professors control. To free their families, loved one and neighbours they decide to stop the Professor while keeping it a secret not causing mass panic.
